article.title: Telcordia to Develop Global Optical Networks Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Telcordia Technologies Incorporated, Piscataway, New Jersey, recently received a $14 million contract for research and development efforts to advance the state of the art and transition of protocols and algorithms for resilient agile global optical networks technology, including demonstration of a cloud computing application. U.S. Army Research and Development Command Contracting Center, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
